patterns: What's the cost of a membership?
responses: We're open from 6 AM to 9 PM on weekdays and 8 AM to 6 PM on weekends.
Yes, we offer personal training. You can book a session with one of our trainers at the front desk.
We offer a variety of classes, including yoga, Pilates, spin, and strength training. You can find the full schedule on our website.
Membership prices vary depending on the length of the contract and the services you choose. Please speak to a staff member for more information.
Our busiest times are usually in the mornings and evenings on weekdays. If you prefer a quieter gym experience, we recommend coming during off-peak hours.
